name: Sakura Space
description: Captain Shika has seen all kinds of things in her adventures throughout the universe, and with her two loyal crew members by her side, she's managed to make a name for her small company of mercenaries. When Shika finds a bounty job offering an absurd amount of money, she doesn't hesitate to act: tracking hardened criminals is part of the...
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows Vista/7/8/8.1 (Compatible with 32 bit and 64 bit) Processor: 1.2 GHz Pentium 4 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1280 x 720 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 300 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Different artist than the rest of the Sakura games but still fun to play.

While I still think Sakura Dungeon is the best of the series, this VN is pretty damn good.   Pros:  -Great character art -Great background art -Catchy music -Yuri!!! -18+ patch for more yuri goodness ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)  Cons: -A little short, could have been longer -No CGs of the action scenes, I get it supposed to be a smut VN but variety is good  Neutral -Not as lewd as Sakura Dungeon, while the 18+ patch is quite lewd it didn't reach Dungeon's level, but this wasn't that much of an issue for me to make it a con
-run game -click help -it doesn't redirect me to a Google search of mental help facilities It's ok.
Gotta have the nudes in space too ;)
Very short, weak plot, overbearing volume of fanservice, but high quality of character & BG art as well as a good UI.
